about_the_game:
The Tuscany Expansion includes 3 new features:
An extended game board, special workers and structures. Choose which features you want to play with or simply play with all of them!

Extended board
You’ve grown your vineyard as much as possible. It's time to expand your operations to all four seasons and spread your influence over the land.
Adds 1 game board, 2 seasons and 36 Influence Tokens

Special Workers
As your vineyard grows, you become more selective about the workers you hire. Some workers have unique skill sets they bring from their previous occupations that might have a positive impact on your vineyard. Adds 11 special workers.

Structures
You’ve worked with the same structures for many years now, so when a local carpenter starts mentioning some new ideas, you’re all ears. It’s time to build a better vineyard. Adds 36 structure cards.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2+, Vulkan capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Viticulture - Tuscany Expansion

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: The Tuscany Expansion includes 3 new features: An extended game board, special workers and structures. Choose which features you want to play with or simply play with all of them!
